title: Emma Raducanu and Jack Draper to face each other in revamped US Open mixed doubles
description: Jack Draper and Emma Raducanu will face each other in the first round of the revamped US Open mixed doubles, with $1m in prize money for the winners of the 16-pair event
content: Jack Draper and Emma Raducanu, will face each other in the first round of the revamped US Open mixed doubles. The event has been moved to before the main tournament, on 19 and 20 August, with $1m (£750,000) in prize money at stake for the winners of ... [2133 chars]

title: Section of M20 closed in Kent after vehicle falls from bridge
description: National Highways says a section of the M20 remains closed in both directions near Addington.
content:
A section of the M20 in Kent has been closed after a vehicle fell from an overbridge during a crash, National Highways has said.
The motorway was closed westbound between junctions three and one - near Addington and Swanley - and eastbound between ju... [264 chars]

title: Wildfires rage in Spain and Portugal amid searing heat
description: Extreme temperatures exacerbated by carbon pollution fuel fires in southern Europe as green policies are rolled back
content:
Relentless heat and raging wildfires continue to ravage southern Europe, with one-quarter of weather stations in Spain recording 40C temperatures as the prime minister urged people to “leave the climate emergency outside of partisan struggles”.

title: Tory MPs complain party attack ad on asylum hotels ‘makes us look silly’
description: Backbenchers say party leadership is criticising Labour government for policies introduced by Conservatives
content:
Conservative MPs have expressed frustration at their party’s “piss-poor” messaging over hotels housing people seeking asylum.
